description: Students deepen their understanding of craft and form by reading contemporary and modern poetry and completing individual, polished writing projects. Class sessions encourage community development as students discuss various options within the poetic form, explore book-length volumes, workshop their writing, and examine the larger poetic landscape's artistic concerns and vocational practices. Prerequisites: ENGL 292 or permission of the instructor.
name: Advanced Poetry Writing
prerequisites: Prerequisites: ENGL 292 or permission of the instructor.
